      Methods in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Color Color.getInstance(String s)
      Get a Color from an HTML style hex color value, i.e "#RRGGBB" or a name such as "red", "green", etc.
      static Color Color.lookupColor(String s)
      Lookup a color without throwing an exception.
      static Color Color.valueOf(String s)
      Same functionality as getInstance().
